name: Ernast Sevo
title: Senior AI/ML Engineer & Data Scientist
summary: Innovative and research-driven AI/ML Engineer and Data Scientist with over 13 years of experience designing, developing, and deploying intelligent data-driven solutions across healthcare, automotive, and autonomous systems. Proficient in building end-to-end machine learning pipelines—from data acquisition and feature engineering to model training, evaluation, and production deployment. Deep expertise in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, and modern MLOps ecosystems (Kubernetes, MLflow, Docker, AWS Sagemaker). Adept at applying deep learning, computer vision, NLP, and predictive modeling to solve complex real-world problems. Recognized for blending research-grade models with scalable production systems that drive measurable business outcomes.
